"Prize Exchange and CC Limit": "You can exchange Casino Coins for luxurious prizes at the Prize Exchange Counter! <yellow>Exchange rates vary by prize. Please note that some prizes have an upper limit on the number that can be claimed. Also, some prizes are only available for a limited time.<c>"

"Your Casino Coins are automatically withdrawn and deposited when you enter and leave the Casino.

If you depart for a quest while your Casino Coins exceed the upper limit, the excess will be lost. (Casino Coin limit: 10,000,000 CC). If you wish to leave the casino after going over the CC limit, you should buy a prize first, so your coins are not wasted.
â€»In a Challenge Block, your Casino Coins will not be lost when departing for a quest."
